# Issue Body Template

Used by taskstoissues when creating GitHub issues from tasks.

```markdown
## Task Details

**Task ID**: <feature-id>/<task-id>
**Phase**: <phase name>
**User Story**: <USn>
**Parallel**: Yes/No

## Description

<task description>

## Dependencies

- Depends on: <linked issues>
- Blocks: <linked issues>

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] File created at specified path
- [ ] Tests pass (if applicable)

---
*Generated by /iikit-08-taskstoissues*
```
